Netanyahu says Schumer speech calling for Israel election was inappropriateIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu told CNN on Sunday that U.S. Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer's speech in which he urged new elections in Israel was "totally inappropriate." Sun, 17 Mar 2024 13:54:27 GMT 5CA22DPZ6VLG5L24PLFCSNFQIM https://www.reuters.com/world/netanyahu-says-schumer-speech-calling-israel-election-was-inproper-2024-03-17/Kanishka Singh世界
Ukrainian drones have hit 12 Russian oil refineries, Kyiv source saysLong-range Ukrainian attack drones launched by the SBU domestic security service have hit 12 Russian oil refineries during the war so far, a Ukrainian intelligence source told Reuters on Sunday. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 12:31:40 GMT BX3QFMBRVVLJHOVUHDCCU6FTR4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-drones-have-hit-12- Russian-oil-refineries-kyiv-source-says-2024-03-17/Reuters世界欧洲
'Noon against Putin': thousands of Russians turn out to fulfil Navalny's 'last wish'Despite the protesters, who represent a fraction of Russia's 114 million voters, Vladimir Putin is poised to remain in power. If he completes his six-year term, he would overtake Josef Stalin to become Russia's longest-serving leader for more than 200 years. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 12:30:54 GMT TUQM654OCJO5BP3P53IZK4QC6E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/noon-against-putin-thousands- Russianns-turn-out-fulfil-navalnys-last-wish-2024-03-17/Guy Faulconbridge, Andrew Osborn世界欧洲
Navalny's widow takes part in 'noon against Putin' protest in Berlin, activists sayYulia Navalnaya, the widow of Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, took part in a noon protest against President Vladimir Putin on Sunday in Berlin. Germany's Scholz say Rafah assault would make regional peace 'very difficult'The large number of civilian casualties that would result from an Israeli assault on the Gaza city of Rafah would make regional peace "very difficult", German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Sunday after talks with Jordanian King Abdullah. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 11:45:59 GMT OQPCSNL7HZOXHMUNLVPE4ITN5E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/germanys-scholz-say-rafah-assault-would-make-regional-peace-very-difficult-2024-03-17/Sarah Marsh世界中东
Netanyahu says Israel to press on with assault as truce talks to resumeIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu dismissed international pressure on Sunday and said he would keep on with the military campaign against Hamas in Gaza, where aid agencies say famine is looming, while ceasefire talks were set to resume. Crash involving passenger bus, fuel truck kills 21 in AfghanistanA traffic accident in southern Afghanistan killed 21 people and injured dozens on Sunday, the provincial government said. India's 'lottery king' emerges as top political donor in opaque systemIndia's "lottery king", accused by the authorities of fraud and money laundering, has emerged with his company as the nation's top political donor under an opaque funding system that has just been partially opened to scrutiny. Breakaway Georgian region is discussing becoming part of Russia, says local officialSouth Ossetia, a region that broke away from Georgia and calls itself an independent state, has discussed becoming part of Russia with Moscow officials, Russian news agency RIA cited the head of South Ossetia's parliament as saying on Sunday.
